name: ITP-001
Details
1.0 - Site enabling works
Acceptance criteria and testing - HEB to carry out Site inspection checks prior to establishment of Paving/Milling
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - I
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - B4UDIG, Dig Permit, Critical Controls
2.0 - Service location and piloting
Acceptance criteria and testing - All services within work area to be located and piloted.
Method - Service located and scope of works outside of restricted area
Frequency - Prior to site/Phase establishm ent
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - I
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
3.0 - Mix Design Approval
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10
Acceptance criteria and testing - JMF to be approved by Engineer prior to surfacing
Method - As per NZTA M10
Frequency - Once, prior to surfacing
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Supplier JMF
HOLD POINT: Above signed off by Engineer prior to milling and surfacing
1.0 - Level Control
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10 TNZ M/1 Technical Specification - 9.3.3
Acceptance criteria and testing - Matanga Projects to mark out design heights via GPS for milling and paving
Method - Survey/ Stringline sheet
Frequency - every after 5M
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - I/W
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB, ENG.
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - As-Builts
2.0 - Asphalt Concrete – AC20 H Grade & AC14 V Grade
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10:2020
Acceptance criteria and testing - Temperature, Spread rate
Method - Temperature Probe/Gun, Site calc for Spread rate
Frequency - every site
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Temp Sheet, Site Asphalt record data, NDM results
3.0 - AC14 PMB Production Tests (Binder & Grading)
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10
Acceptance criteria and testing - Sampling Bituminous Paving mixtures
Method - M10 – Table 5.2
Frequency - One test per 200 t of asphalt plant production
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IANZ Lab Report
3.0 - AC20 H Grade Production Tests (Binder & Grading)
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10
Acceptance criteria and testing - Sampling Bituminous Paving mixtures
Method - M10 – Table 5.2
Frequency - One test per 600 t of asphalt plant production
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IANZ Lab Report
4.0 - AC20 H Grade - Asphalt Compaction/De nsity Tests/Thickness
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10
Acceptance criteria and testing - NDM
— Core testing shall be performed by a laboratory accredited to NZS ISO/IEC 17025
*Note – NDM to Core Correlation to be provided in lieu of cores after first 3 sets of core results
Method - M10 – 9.9.1
Frequency - One per Production over 30T
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IANZ Lab Report
4.1 - AC14 V Grade – Asphalt Compaction/Density
Applicable Standard or Specification - NZTA M10
Acceptance criteria and testing - NDM Only
Frequency - Every Shift of FWC
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Method - R
Verification method and responsible inspectorate for hold points: Responsible - HEB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - HEB records
This ITP has been prepared by
Reviewed by [as applicable]
Approved by [as applicable]
